Text: Visit to Enron Cc Vince Thanks for arranging my visit to Enron I was impressed by the nature and scope of work in the group and the people I met I look forward to hearing from you later in the week A few peple asked me the method I used to value Asian options It is an approximate method based on geometrical averaging with an adjusted exercise price as described by Gordon Gemmill in Option Pricing An International Perspective McGrawHill London pages Regards Greg Get Your Private Free Email from MSN Hotmail at
